from user_info
order by ${orderByClause}

update user_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
household = #{household,jdbcType=CHAR},
nation = #{nation,jdbcType=CHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=CHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grdt_school = #{grdtSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sch_record = #{schRecord,jdbcType=CHAR},
grdt_date = #{grdtDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=CHAR},
cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=CHAR},
mail = #{mail,jdbcType=CHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR},
brn_company = #{brnCompany,jdbcType=CHAR},
department = #{department,jdbcType=CHAR},
join_date = #{joinDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
join_addrss = #{joinAddrss,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cntrct_type = #{cntrctType,jdbcType=CHAR},
cntrct_begin = #{cntrctBegin,jdbcType=CHAR},
cntrct_end = #{cntrctEnd,jdbcType=CHAR},
salary_card = #{salaryCard,jdbcType=CHAR},
expense_card = #{expenseCard,jdbcType=CHAR},

accnt_type = #{accntType,jdbcType=CHAR},
accnt_state = #{accntState,jdbcType=CHAR},
user_state = #{userState,jdbcType=CHAR},
where sequence_num = #{sequenceNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}
